Uses of Class
org.jamwiki.model.TopicVersion

  • Packages that use TopicVersion 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki.db
    Provides classes needed for all database interaction.
    org.jamwiki.model
    Provides basic objects for use on the Wiki, including WikiUser, Topic, TopicVersion, etc.

    • Uses of TopicVersion in org.jamwiki.db

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TopicVersion QueryHandler.lookupTopicVersion(int topicVersionId)
      Retrieve a result set containing a specific topic version.
      TopicVersion AnsiQueryHandler.lookupTopicVersion(int topicVersionId) 
      TopicVersion AnsiDataHandler.lookupTopicVersion(int topicVersionId)
      Retrieve a TopicVersion object for a given topic version ID.
      Methods in org.jamwiki.db with parameters of type TopicVersion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AnsiDataHandler.deleteTopic(Topic topic, TopicVersion topicVersion)
      Mark a topic deleted by setting its delete date to a non-null value.
      protected void CacheQueryHandler.prepareTopicVersionStatement(TopicVersion topicVersion, PreparedStatement stmt) 
      protected void AnsiQueryHandler.prepareTopicVersionStatement(TopicVersion topicVersion, PreparedStatement stmt) 
      void AnsiDataHandler.undeleteTopic(Topic topic, TopicVersion topicVersion)
      Undelete a previously deleted topic by setting its delete date to a null value.
      void QueryHandler.updateTopicVersion(TopicVersion topicVersion, Connection conn)
      Update a topic version record in the database.
      void AnsiQueryHandler.updateTopicVersion(TopicVersion topicVersion, Connection conn) 
      protected void AnsiDataValidator.validateTopicVersion(TopicVersion topicVersion)
      Validate that all fields of a TopicVersion object are valid for the database.
      void AnsiDataHandler.writeTopic(Topic topic, TopicVersion topicVersion, Map<String,String> categories, List<String> links)
      Add or update a Topic object.
      Method parameters in org.jamwiki.db with type arguments of type TopicVersion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void QueryHandler.insertTopicVersions(List<TopicVersion> topicVersions, Connection conn)
      Add a new topic version record to the database.
      void AnsiQueryHandler.insertTopicVersions(List<TopicVersion> topicVersions, Connection conn) 
      void AnsiDataHandler.writeTopicVersions(Topic topic, List<TopicVersion> topicVersions)
      This method exists for performance reasons for scenarios such as topic imports where many versions may be added without the need to update the topic record.
